EmailTemplate.name: ERB - Paperwork Policy
EmailTemplate.subject: Requesting Account Set Up - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Engine Rental Bank would like to emphasize that our stance is based on the legal requirement to obtain these documents. We’ve recently had a situation with an operator where a service center did not collect the documents and we were unable to follow-up to collect them. The position we are taking is intended to provide our service centers the authority to get the documentation from operators in advance of the rental requirement, and prevent “chasing” from the service center and Honeywell’s perspective. We recognize that there will be exceptions based on AOG requirements, but the continued expectation will be that the bailment and proof of insurance documents will be provided prior to shipment when the order is not AOG.
Do not remove the reference # from the subject line from this email chain.
Please always reply to EngineRentals@Honeywell.com for all responses.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerName__c} {!Case.OwnerTitle}
Honeywell Engine Rental Bank 1-800-601-3099 (Within US and Canada) 00800-601-30999 (Within Europe) 602-365-3099 (All other countries) EngineRentals@Honeywell.com
